string-array.name: about_random_tips
string-array.item: "Make sure you tell your phone you love it before you ruthlessly throw it"
"You might forget it after playing this for a while, but phones are used to call people too. Don't forget to call home every once and a while"
"Don't try to drop your phone on the moon. This app was designed for Earth use only"
"This app is rated 'R' for radical, user discretion is advised"
"While it may yield a very high score, don't use a blender to spin your phone"
"If phones weren't meant to be chucked, they wouldn't fit so nicely in our hands"
"Make sure you pick up your phone after dropping it, otherwise you won't have a phone anymore"
"Phones respond well to sarcasm. After dropping yours, be sure to ask 'How's the weather down there?'"
"In the somewhat likely event that your phone becomes sentient, deny ever using this app with it"
"The 'Chuck Your Phone' team thanks your phone for its valiant sacrifices made in the name of fun"
"This app can also be loaded onto phone booths if you like challenges"
"There is a hidden setting you can unlock by getting the hidden badge. I can't tell you how to get it though. On a totally unrelated note, have you checked out the credits below yet?"
"If you have any problems with this app, please drop your phone anywhere outside and we will return it to you at our earliest convenience"
"Try to chuck your phone into a soft surface like a pillow, your bed, or soft serve ice cream"
"Don't worry about breaking your phone. Phones may be expensive, but entertainment is priceless"
"The 'Chuck My Phone' team is developing new phone cases with better grips, airbags, all-terrain drive, and luxury seating for five. Be sure to check out your local car dealer for it soon"
"Don't tell your parents about this app. We only want cool kids playing it and grown ups are poopyheads"
"This app has a built in dating functionality. To use it, just throw your phone at someone you think is cute"
"Please use this app irresponsibly"
"The 'Chuck Your Phone' team is totally happy with how this app came out. We have no passive aggressive tensions remaining whatsoever\n*glares at Nate >:( *"
"Remember to get your phone a healthy amount of milk in its diet so its bones stand up to this app's shenanigans"
"Try to drop your phone onto a soft surface like a pile of clothes, a piece of rubber, or on your pets tummy"
